name: Tank (itch) (FrankR64)
description:
My version of the classic atari game Tank, shoot down the enemy tank to rack up points but avoid the mines and pick up the power-ups to temporarily go through walls

P1 (White Tank) Controls: Up arrow - move forward

Down arrow - reverse

Left and Right arrows - turn 

/? key - Fire cannon

P2 (Black Tank) Controls: W - move forward

S - reverse

A and D - turn

Space bar - Fire cannon
